item.title: Biophil add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Biophil add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "If it turns out that there is a God...the worst that you can say about him is that basically he's an underachiever." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Biophil add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Agnostics are just atheists without balls." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Biophil add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The word 'God' is for me nothing more than the expression and product of human weaknesses, and religious scripture a collection of honourable, but still primitive legends which are nevertheless pretty childish. No interpretation, no matter how subtle, can (for me) change this." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Biophil add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Biophil add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric." -- Bertrand Russell
